title: Mixed-platonic 3-manifolds
authors:
Eric Chesebro, Michelle Chu, Jason DeBlois, Neil R. Hoffman, Priyadip
  Mondal, and Genevieve S. Walsh
abstract:
We introduce a class of cusped hyperbolic $3$-manifolds that we call
mixed-platonic, composed of regular ideal hyperbolic polyhedra of more than one
type, which includes certain previously-known examples. We establish basic
facts about mixed-platonic manifolds which allow us to conclude, among other
things, that there is no mixed-platonic hyperbolic knot complement with hidden
symmetries.
